sen.j: 笠トンネル（かさトンネル）は京都府京都市北区 (京都市)と右京区に跨るトンネルである。
sen.e: The Kasa Tunnel is the tunnel streching over Kita Ward and Ukyo Ward of Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
The Kasa Tunnel is the tunnel running between Kita Ward and Ukyo Ward of Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
The Kasa Tunnel is the tunnel running between Kita Ward and Ukyo Ward of Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 国道162号笠峠の直下を貫くトンネルである。
sen.e: The Kasa Tunnel is the tunnel for the National Road No. 162, running directly beneath the Kasa Pass.
The Kasa Tunnel is the tunnel for the National Road No. 162, running directly beneath the Kasa Pass.
The Kasa Tunnel is the tunnel for the National Road No. 162, running directly beneath the Kasa Pass.

sen.j: 1973年3月に開通し、延長1199m、幅員8mで、国道162号のトンネルの中では国道27号と重複中の旗護山トンネル、福井県境の堀越トンネルに次ぐ3番目の長さを誇る。
sen.e: This tunnel was opened for traffice in March, 1973, with the length of 1199m, (8m in the width) which is the third longest tunnel of the National Road No. 162, next to the Hatagoyama Tunnel that also linked to the National Road No. 27, and the Horikoshi Tunnel located at the boarder of Fukui Prefecture and Kyoto Prefecture.

This tunnel was opened for traffic in March, 1973, with the length of 1199m, (8m in the width) which is the third longest tunnel of the National Road No. 162, next to the Hatagoyama Tunnel that also linked to the National Road No. 27, and the Horikoshi Tunnel located at the boarder of Fukui Prefecture and Kyoto Prefecture.

Opened for traffic in March, 1973, this tunnel has a length of 1199m, (width: 8 m), which is the third longest tunnel of National Road No. 162, next to the Hatagoyama Tunnel that is also linked to National Road No. 27, and the Horikoshi Tunnel located at the border of Fukui Prefecture and Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて変更・補足

sen.j: 周山地域と京都市を結ぶ道としては唯一のトンネルであり、最も利用の多い道路である。
sen.e: This is the only National Road connecting Shuzan region with Kyoto City, therefore the use of this road and the tunnel is the highest among those roads in this area.
sen.cmt: 原文が意味把握できないものとなっています。「周山地域と京都市を結ぶ道としては唯一のものであり、最も利用の多い道路である。」であれば通りますがトンネルの説明ではなくなってしまいます。「周山地域と京都市を結ぶ道としては唯一のものであり、最も利用の多い道路である。その道路にあるトンネルであるため交通量が多い。」といった本意があったのでしょうか。
sen.e: This is the only National Road connecting Shuzan region with Kyoto City, therefore the use of this road and the tunnel is the highest among those roads in this area.
This is the only tunnel that connects the Shuzan region with Kyoto City, so the road in this tunnel has the highest traffic volume of all the roads in this area.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて変更・補足

sen.j: 片側1車線の道路を有しており、照明も多い。
sen.e: This tunnel houses a two-lane road illuminated with many lights.
This tunnel houses a two-lane road illuminated with many lights.
This tunnel houses a two-lane road illuminated with many lights.

sen.j: トンネル前後の道路は50km/hの速度規制だが、トンネル内は40km/hに規制されている。
sen.e: The speed limit of this section of the road outside of this tunnel is set at 50km/h, but while the speed limit inside of this tunnel is set at 40km/h.
The speed limit of this section of the road outside of this tunnel is set at 50km/h, but while the speed limit inside of this tunnel is set at 40km/h.
The speed limit of this section of the road outside of this tunnel is set at 50km/h, but while the speed limit inside of this tunnel is set at 40km/h.

sen.j: 福井県と京都府を結ぶ周山街道国道162号上にある為、交通量は多く、貨物自動車などの牽引車両やツーリング (オートバイ)をするバイクなど様々な種類の車両が通行するトンネルである。
sen.e: The traffic volume of this tunnel is high as it was built for the Shuzan-Kaido Road, the National Road No. 162, which is used by various type of vehicles such as the freeight tractor-trailers or touring motorcycles.

The traffic volume of this tunnel is high as it was built for the Shuzan-Kaido Road, the National Road No. 162, which is used by various type of vehicles such as the freight tractor-trailers or touring motorcycles.

The traffic volume of this tunnel is high as it was built for the Shuzan-Kaido Road, the National Road No. 162, which is used by various type of vehicles such as the freight tractor-trailers or touring motorcycles.

sen.j: 京都府京都市北区小野上ノ町 - 右京区京北細野町
sen.e: Onokamino-cho, Kita Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture - Keihoku Hosono-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto Prefecture
Onokamino-cho, Kita Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture - Keihoku Hosono-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto Prefecture
